Job Title: Senior Engineer - Highway

Location: Christiansburg, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Design, Engineering, Science

Description:
Job Description

Century Engineering, LLC, a Kleinfelder Company, is a multidisciplinary professional services firm offering a broad range of services to include consulting, engineering, environmental, planning, design, and construction services. With a dedicated staff of over 600 technical and administrative personnel throughout the Mid-Atlantic region, we provide our clients with quality, innovative and value-added professional services in many specialized areas. Orientated around our employees first, Century provides competitive salaries and an excellent comprehensive benefits package which includes a 401k retirement plan, paid holidays, paid leave time and various employee perks and discounts. In addition to offering a challenging and diverse work environment, Century's culture encourages community service, continued learning, personal growth and fun!

Century is seeking an experienced and motivated Senior Engineer - Highway who desires increasing responsibilities as part of our highway/transportation design team.  Candidates will assist in maintaining existing and building new client relationships. The candidate will be expected to work on multiple design projects and assist in the preparation of engineering documents for advertisement and construction. Projects will range from small transportation enhancement, trails or PAR sidewalk projects to large highway projects. Highway projects will range from intersection improvements to road widenings and large interchange projects.

Flexible work arrangements may be discussed at the interview stage.

Responsibilities:

Lead the designs of multiple highway and transportation projects

Lead Highway Engineer role on larger transportation projects

Supervise design staff across offices on assigned projects and provide quality assurance for meeting design criteria and regulatory requirements

Develop or assist in the development of project design fees and project budgets

Responsible for coordination with clients, subconsultants and other government and regulatory agencies

Occasionally travel to project/client sites to complete tasks or attend meetings

Qualifications:

BSCE from ABET accredited engineering program

Minimum of 10 years of experience in highway and transportation design

Registered Professional Engineer preferred

Candidates must be capable of working on multiple projects in a fast-paced team-oriented environment

Ability to lead others on projects and facilitate teamwork

Excellent written and oral communication skills are a must

A working knowledge of Federal, State and local jurisdiction permitting regulations is required

Applicant must have a general understanding of design and plan preparation using Microstation and be proficient in MS office suite

Valid driver's license with demonstrated safe driving practices

Century Engineering, LLC, a Kleinfelder Company, is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. Committed to employment equality, employment selections and related decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status. Century ensures nondiscrimination in all programs and activities in accordance with all applicable laws and is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with disabilities. If a medical condition or disability necessitates a reasonable accommodation for any part of this application process, please contact Human Resources or call 443-589-2400 (MD, DE, PA) 804-644-4600 (VA) and ask to speak with a Human Resources representative.

Equal Opportunity Employer of Disabilities/Veterans

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
